" Ah ! Of course . "[197-noel] [He]197-noel did not dare look back , to see if [her]2792-its mother gaze was following [him]197-noel , but [he]197-noel thought : ' Chance or no chance , [I]0-i 'm going to fight for [her]2797-that little creature tooth and nail . '

In [a room]4134-a room darkened against the evening sun [Pierson]198-pierson was sitting on a sofa reading . The sight of that figure in khaki disconcerted [Fort]197-noel , who had not realised that there would be this metamorphosis . The narrow face , clean - shaven now , with its deep - set eyes and compressed lips , looked more priestly than ever , in spite of this brown garb . [He]197-noel felt [his]197-noel hope suddenly to be very forlorn indeed . And rushing at the fence , [he]197-noel began abruptly :

" [I]197-noel 've come to ask [you]197-noel , [sir]3028-sir , for [your]197-noel permission to marry [Noel]197-noel , if [she]2797-that little creature will have [me]197-noel . "[197-noel]

[He]197-noel had thought [Pierson]198-pierson 's face gentle ; it was not gentle now . " Did [you]197-noel know [I]197-noel was [here]3149-here , then , [Captain Fort]197-noel ? "[197-noel]

" [I]197-noel am sorry [you]197-noel have come . It is not for [me]197-noel to judge , but [I]197-noel do n't think [you]197-noel will make [Noel]197-noel happy . "[197-noel]

[[My]197-noel cousin]3431-my cousin [Leila]208-leila has a claim on [you]197-noel . It is [her]208-leila [you]197-noel should ask to marry [you]197-noel . "[197-noel]

" [I]197-noel did ask [her]208-leila ; [she]208-leila refused . "[197-noel]

" [I]197-noel 'm clearly not [a good man]3731-a good man in [your]197-noel sense of the word ; but [I]197-noel love [her]4461-her terribly , and [I]197-noel would protect [her]4461-her . " [The man who is truly in love]4462-the man who is truly in love does what is best for [the one [he]4462-the man who is truly in love loves]4463-the one he loves . "[197-noel] [Fort]197-noel bent [his]197-noel head ; [he]197-noel felt as if [he]197-noel were at [school]3099-school again , confronting [[his]197-noel head - master]2800-his head - master . " That 's true , "[197-noel] [he]197-noel said . " And [I]197-noel shall never trade on [her]4461-her position . " [She]4461-her is [a child]415-a child . "[2800-his head - master]

" No , [she]4461-her 's not [a child]415-a child , "[197-noel] said [Fort]197-noel stubbornly .

[Pierson]198-pierson touched the lapel of [his]197-noel new tunic . " [Captain Fort]197-noel , [I]198-pierson am going far away from [her]4461-her , and leaving [her]4461-her without protection . [Fort]197-noel threw back [his]197-noel head . " No , no , [I]197-noel wo n't accept that position . With or without [your]197-noel presence the facts will be the same . "[197-noel]

[Pierson]198-pierson came slowly up to [him]197-noel . " In [my]197-noel view , "[197-noel] [he]197-noel said , " [you]197-noel are as bound to [Leila]208-leila as if [you]197-noel were married to [her]208-leila . "[197-noel]
